import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { zodResolver } from "@hookform/resolvers/zod"; import { z } from "zod"; // Validation schema const questionSchema = z.object({ emailAddress: z.string().email("Invalid email address"), interestingQuestionAsked: z.string().min(1, "This field is required"), interviewForIndustry: z.string().min(1, "This field is required"), interviewForCompany: z.string().min(1, "This field is required"), interviewForDesignation: z.string().min(1, "This field is required"), interviewForYearsExperience: z.number().positive("Must be a valid number"), interviewForYear: z.number().min(1900).max(new Date().getFullYear()), interestingQuestionGiven: z.string().min(1, "This field is required"), givenForIndustry: z.string().min(1, "This field is required"), givenForCompany: z.string().min(1, "This field is required"), givenForDesignation: z.string().min(1, "This field is required"), givenForYearsExperience: z.number().positive("Must be a valid number"), givenForYear: z.number().min(1900).max(new Date().getFullYear()), receiveUpdates: z.boolean(), }); export default function FormPage() { const [isSuccessModalOpen, setIsSuccessModalOpen] = useState(false); const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }, reset, } = useForm({ resolver: zodResolver(questionSchema), }); const onSubmit = async (data) => { try { const response = await fetch("http://localhost:4000/submit", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(data), }); if (response.ok) { setIsSuccessModalOpen(true); reset(); } else { alert("Failed to submit form."); } } catch (error) { console.error("Error submitting form:", error); } }; return (
{/* Header */}
